summary: The diff largely implements the Prize Portal rebrand across core screens: updated header/footer branding, replaced TikTok/neon asset references with Prize Portal asset filenames, updated eligibility checklist text to be generic, and introduced a new gold/amber-based theme via CSS variables and Tailwind extensions. However, the diff does not show the required generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and it introduces a new React Query hooks file that was not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the app loads the new Prize Portal generated assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and that all referenced generated assets exist under that directory.
missing_requirements.reason: UI components were updated to reference new Prize Portal asset filenames, but the diff shows no added files and no changes under frontend/public/assets/generated, so there is no evidence the required images were actually added to the repo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a new set of React Query hooks for backend integration (useQueries.ts) with placeholder implementations.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on rebranding and explicitly lists non-goals around real backend logic; it does not request introducing new React Query integration hooks.
